name: Puzzle O Buzzle
description:
Like classic game Scrabble? Want to find another good and new game to face a new challenge? Buzzle Puzzle is your choice!

Here you will face a new challenge: Spell as much words of 2-7 letters from given 7 letters as you can in 60 seconds! You get extra time bonus after you submit a word of 5+ points score, and each game you need to rest for 3 seconds before you start another one.
Each letter has a point according to its frequency in words. A, E, I, L, N, O, R, S, T, U are high frequency letters, they have only 1 point. D, G for 2 points. B, C, M, P for 3 points. F, H, V, W, Y for 4 points. K for 5 points. J, X for 8 points, and Q, Z for 10 points.

There are also bonus slots, *2/*3 points for the letter in the slot or Double/Tripple points for the whole word. If the letters you input is green, it means you are inputing a correct word, you can tap DONE to submit it and get a score for the word. Otherwise it means the word does not exist in Scrabble lexicon, you need to change it. Have fun!
